Study Title: Melphalan, Prednisone and Thalidomide Versus Melphalan and Prednisone in Elderly Myeloma Patients
Brief Summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the association of Thalidomide to Melphalan and Prednisone is effective in the treatment of newly diagnosed elderly multiple myeloma.
Primary Outcome Measures: Response Rate|Progression Free Survival|Event Free Survival
Sponsor: Gruppo Italiano per lo Studio del Mieloma Multiplo
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
